translations: 丧亲之痛（bereave we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: Bereave we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s are raining into my life which are making my shrinking heart quiver in its intensity of suffering.
sentences.translation: 各种丧失向我生命倾注，使我畏缩的心灵在剧烈的折磨中发抖。

sentences.sentence: Bereave we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s and blessings, on following another, make us sad and blessed by turns.Even death itself makes life more loving.
sentences.translation: 痛苦和幸福轮番而至，让我们悲喜交集，甚至死亡都让人生更为可爱。

sentences.sentence: Bereave we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s and blessings, on following another, make us sad and blessed by turns. Even death itself makes life more loving.
sentences.translation: 痛苦和幸福轮番而至，让我们悲喜交集，甚至死亡都让人生更为可爱。
